1.0.9.title: Complete Playlist System
features: Full playlist management system - create, edit, share, and play custom playlists
Two playlist types: user playlists (personal) and server playlists (shared with server)
Liked Songs playlist with quick-add via /like command and player embed button (❤️)
Share codes with 24-hour expiry - generate 8-character codes to share playlists
Direct user sharing - share playlists with specific users
Collaborative playlists - allow collaborators to add/remove tracks
Import playlists from Spotify URLs with automatic thumbnail extraction
Import playlists from YouTube URLs with full metadata support
Playlist pagination - browse through all tracks with Next/Previous buttons
Track search in playlist add - autocomplete suggestions just like /play command
Playlist thumbnails - automatically extracted from Spotify/YouTube imports
Protected Liked Songs - cannot be deleted or renamed
13 playlist subcommands: create, delete, list, view, play, add, remove, rename, move, edit, collaborators, merge, share, import
fixes: Playlist view now uses pagination buttons that update the same message instead of sending new embeds
Like button moved to first row of player controls (after skip button) for better accessibility
changes: Playlists stored in JSON format (helpers/data/playlists.json)
Share codes expire after 24 hours with automatic cleanup
Playlist add command supports track search with autocomplete (same as /play)
Collaborative mode allows shared editing while protecting owner permissions
DJ mode integration - only DJs can play server playlists when DJ mode active
Comprehensive help documentation added for all playlist features
Player embed like button uses Unicode ❤️ (temporary, can be replaced with custom emoji)

1.0.8.title: Live Autocomplete for Play Command
features: Live autocomplete search for /play command - get instant song suggestions as you type
Shows up to 10 unique song results with deduplication
Fast search results (limited to 15 tracks for speed)
Filters out duplicate entries by title and artist
Works with any search query - YouTube and Spotify sources supported
changes: Play command now provides interactive autocomplete suggestions
Search results are cached and deduplicated for better user experience
Query optimization ensures fast response times

1.0.7.title: Deezer Integration for Enhanced Autoplay
features: Deezer recommendations integration for superior autoplay quality
Returns 40 high-quality track recommendations per seed
Replaces Spotify recommendations as primary source (more reliable)
Full metadata support (artist, title, duration, album art)
No additional API calls needed - faster and more efficient
changes: Autoplay now uses Deezer as primary recommendation source
Spotify credentials now optional (only used for metadata enrichment)
Improved candidate quality and recommendation accuracy
Enhanced genre consistency with Deezer's recommendation algorithm
Updated README and help documentation to reflect Deezer integration

1.0.6.title: SeekTo & Previous Button Fixes
fixes: Fixed seekTo command rejecting flexible timestamp formats (3:00, 1:30, etc.)
Fixed previous button not refreshing player embed with correct track info
Fixed player state synchronization when using previous track functionality
changes: SeekTo now accepts flexible formats: seconds (90), MM:SS (3:00), or H:MM:SS (1:30:45)
Previous button now uses Lavalink's trackStart event for consistent UI updates
Player state updates before calling updatePlayer to ensure correct track info display

1.0.5.title: Version Announcements & Patch Notes System
features: Automatic version announcements when new updates are released
/changelog command to view patch notes for any version with interactive navigation
/setup announcements command to configure announcement channel and preferences
Bot status now displays current version (e.g., 'NeoBeat Buddy v1.0.5')
Once per guild per version tracking - no duplicate announcements
Interactive navigation with 'Older', 'Latest', 'Newer' buttons
Direct links to GitHub changelog and bug reporting from announcements
changes: Announcements sent to configured channel or fallback to first available text channel
Admins can enable/disable announcements per server
Patch notes categorized into Features, Fixes, and Changes sections
Guild state now includes announcement preferences and version tracking

Smart artist diversity with context-aware 'vibe match' scoring system
Voice region automatic reconnection when Discord changes voice servers
